segments.text: How did you do in the last quiz ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I doubt if I can pass it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't be so worried , You know Professor Robert is not too strict .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I often skip his classes , and he doesn't like me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope you'll do better in the final .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I must , if I want to pass the course .
segments.speaker: S2
